Title: Establishes the crime of assault on a food delivery person
Summary: Establishes the crime of assault on a food delivery person as a class E felony; defines a food delivery person to mean a person employed by a restaurant, or put into service by a restaurant, retail food store licensed by the department of agriculture and markets, or a third party vendor, or to deliver food or other goods pursuant to an order placed by a customer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to assault on a food delivery person
